---. Essays on Biblical Interpretation. Ed. Lewis S. Mudge. Philadelphia: Fortress, 1980.
---. "Existence and Hermeneutics." Trans. Kathleen McLaughlin. In The Con- flict of Interpretations: Essays in Hermeneutics. Ed. Don Ihde. Evanston: Northwestern UP, 1974.

---. "The hermeneutical function of distanciation." In his Hermeneutics and the Human Sciences, 131-44. Translation of his "La fonction herméneutique de la distanciation." In Exegesis: Problèmes de méthode et exercices de lecture. Ed. Francois Bovon and Gregoire Rouiller. Neuchâtel: Delachaux et Niestlé, 1975. Modified version in English in Philosophy Today, 17 (1973), 129-43.

---. "Hermeneutics and the cntique of ideology". In his Hermeneutics and the Human Sciences, 63-100. Translation of his "Herméneutique et critique des idéologies." In Demythisation et idéologie. Ed. Enrico Castelli. Paris: Aubier Montaigne, 1973.
---. Hermeneutics and the Human Sciences. Ed. and trans. John B. Thompson. Cam- bridge and Paris: Cambridge UP and Editions de la Maison des Sciences de l'Homme, cl981.
---. Interpretation Theory: Discourse and the Surplus of Meaning. Fort Worth: Texas Christian UP, cl976.

---. "Metaphor and the central problem of hermeneutics." In his Hermeneutics and the Human Sciences, 165-81. Translation of his "La métaphore et le problème central de l'hermenéutique." In Revue philosophique de Louvain, 70 (1972), 93-112. English translation in New Literary History, 6 (1974), 95-110; and Graduate Faculty Philosophy Journal, 3 (1973-4), 42-58.

---. The narrative function. In his Hermeneutics and the Human sciences, 274-96. Translation of his "La fonction narrative." In Études théobgiques et religieuses, 54 (1979), 209-30. Shorter version in English in Semeia, 13 (1978), 177-202.

---. "Phenomenology and hermeneutics." In his Hermeneutics and the Human Sciences, 101-28. Translation of his "Phénoménologie et herméneutique." In Phänomenologische Forschungen. Ed. Ernst Wolfgang Orth. Freiburg: Karl Alber, 1975. I, 31-77. Par- tial translation in English in Noûs, 9 (1975), 85-102.
---. The Symbolism of Evil. Trans. Emerson Buchanan. New York: Harper & Row, cl967.

---. "The task of hermeneutics." In his Hermeneutics and the Human Sciences, 43-62. Translation of his "La tache de I'hémeneutique." In Exegesis: Problémes de méthode et exercices de lecture. Ed Francois Bovon and Gregoire Rouiller. Neuchâtel: Dela- chaux et Niestlé, 1975. English translation in Philosophy Today, 17 (1973), 112-28.
---. "Toward a Hermeneutic of the Idea of Revelation." In his Essays on Biblical Interpretation, 73-118.

---. "What is a text? Explanation and Understanding. In his Hermeneutics and the Human Sciences, 145-64. Translation of his "Qu'est-ce qu'un texte? expliquer et com- prendre." In Hermeneutik und Dialektik. Ed. Rüdiger Bubner, et al. Tubingen: J.C.B. Mohr, 1970. II, 181-200. Abridged version in English in Mythic-Symbolic Language and Philosophical Anthropology. Ed. David Rasmussen. The Hague: Martinus Nij- hoff, 1971.
Stevens, Wallace, "Thirteen Ways of Looking at a Blackbird." In The Palm at the End of the Mind. Ed. Holly Stevens. New York: Vintage, 1972.
